chairs-design.Name: Antler Chairs
chairs-design.Body: This Antler armchair has been constructed from naturally shed red deer and are an original design. The chair has a wraparound design and has a deep seat, with a unique look. The arm rest support as well as the cushioned seat is upholstered in a high quality black cowhide. H80cm W59cm D60cm

chairs-design.Name: Black Cowhide upholstered Antler stool
chairs-design.Body: This beautiful and unique stool is designed from naturally shed red deer Antlers from Scotland and upholstered in a jet black cowhide. The stool is not only a fantastic looking piece but is also well proportioned and very versatile for different rooms in the house. Dimensions: H38cm W91cm D52cm other sizes available

chandelier-design.Name: Twelve Light Two Tier Antler Chandelier
chandelier-design.Body: This antler chandelier was custom designed and made from naturally shed large red deer antlers. This unique light features two tiers and 12 candle styled lights with nickel plate. The hardware can also be done in antique brass, if preferred. H140cm W120cm D120cm other sizes Available

chandelier-design.Name: Six Light Tall Antler Chandelier
chandelier-design.Body: This antler chandelier was custom designed and made from naturally shed large red deer antlers. This unique light features six candle styled lights with antique brass hardware. The hardware can also be done in nickel plated, if preferred. H140cm W120cm D120cm other sizes available

chandelier-design.Name: Eight Light Antler chandelier
chandelier-design.Body: This outstanding antler chandelier was custom designed and made from naturally shed red deer antlers. This unique light features 8 light candle style lights with antique brass hardware. The hardware can also be done in nickel finish, if preferred.H70cm W140cm D140cm other sizes available

chandelier-design.Name: Six Light Antler chandelier
chandelier-design.Body: This outstanding antler chandelier was custom designed and made from naturally shed red deer antlers. This unique light features 6 light candle style lights with antique brass hardware. The hardware can also be done in nickel finish, if preferred. H60cm W90cm D90cm other sizes available

david-moura-collection.Name: Five light candlestick
david-moura-collection.Body: This design of naturally shed red deer antlers have five nickel plated candlestick holders mounted on a matching nickel plated circular base. They are unique and yet have a contemporary look. H70cm W48cm D40cm and has circular base D27cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Three Light candlesticks
david-moura-collection.Body: This design of naturally shed red deer antlers have three polished Nickel candlestick holders mounted on a matching Nickel circular base. They are unique and yet have a contemporary look. H70cm W48cm D40cm and has circular base D27cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Three Lights candlesticks
david-moura-collection.Body: This design of naturally shed red deer antlers have three polished brass candlestick holders mounted on a matching brass circular base. They are unique and yet have a contemporary look. H70cm W48cm D40cm and has circular base D27cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Pair of red Deer Antler candlesticks
david-moura-collection.Body: These lovely and unique candlesticks, from red deer antler horn is individually crafted and hand made. They are set in an oval wood base with horn trim. The candlesticks would make a wonderful and rustic accent feature for many rooms and settings. H68cm W25cm D60cm has an oval wooden base W14cm D20cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Three light Candlesticks
david-moura-collection.Body: This design of naturally shed fallow deer antlers have three antique Brass candlestick holders mounted on a matching Antique brass circular base. They are unique and yet have a contemporary look. H70cm W48cm D40cm and has circular black base D27cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Large Antler lamps
david-moura-collection.Body: This highly decorative table lamp are comprised of naturally shed Red deer antlers. The antlers are mounted onto a circular antique brass base with an antique brass cup holder. These lights are a beautiful combination of natural beauty and contemporary styling. H70cm W48cm D40cm and has circular base D27cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Wall Lights
david-moura-collection.Body: This traditionally styled wall lights has an antler design with 3 lights on an oval wooden shield the metal components are antique brass but can be made in a Nickel finish, which would make for great rustic lighting in a traditional property. These wall lights are designed and manufactured in the London UK.  Size: H35cm W25cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Wall lights
david-moura-collection.Body: This traditionally styled wall lights has an antler design with 2 lights the metal components are antique brass but can be made in a Nickel finish, which would make for great rustic lighting in a traditional property. These wall lights are designed and manufactured in the London UK.  Size: H35cm W25cm

david-moura-collection.Name: Oval Antler mirror
david-moura-collection.Body: This bespoke large oval mirror is comprised of naturally shed red deer antlers with an oval mirror inlayed. The natural beauty of Antlers combined with the functionality and design of the wall mirror make this item an amazing talking point of any room. H110cm W90cm D16cm

A ornate and decorative oval wall mirror comprised of an array of different shells including clam, conch and abalone.

Height: 35 in. (88.9 cm)Width: 24 in. (60.96 cm)Depth: 5.13 in. (13.04 cm)
